root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 9-1-2, translated into en
root.data:
Comments and limitations:

Coverage for aviation is for all ICAO 191 Member States.

Coverage for road, rail, inland waterways and pipelines is for all U.N. member States, but these are sourced from official statistics only for UNECE member States and ITF member States (and only when available).
